title: The Art Institute of Chicago Beanie Hat
description:
Beanie Hat developed from The Art Institute of Chicago Logo designed by Abbot Miller, partner of Pentagram, 2009.

Hats off to our great institution. Flaunt your support in our cozy slouchy beanie hat.  Though stacked vertically, the words “Art,” “Institute,” and “Chicago” each have equal weight, reflecting our continued commitment to our collection, our mission as an educational institution, and our deep connection to our city and our community. The current logo was designed in 2009 by Abbot Miller, partner of Pentagram.

  • Size: One size fits most.
  • Dimensions: 8.25 x 8 in.
  • Materials: 62% Acrylic, 38% Polyester.
